title: Panaracer Revamps Their Gravelking Tire Lineup, Adds New X1 Tread
content:
Their 'most advanced Gravelking yet' includes an all-new X1 tread pattern and three casing options.

Read the full article at Panaracer Revamps Their Gravelking Tire Lineup, Adds New X1 Tread on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
